com.scitools.understand

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scitools.understand.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents and understand Database. With the exception of close() all functions require the database be open.

    • Method Summary

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Retrieve the filename of the database.
        Returns:
        filename of database

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the database. This must be called to release all the memory associated with the database. Once it is called, the database and all associated objects (entities, references ...) become invalid. This function can safely be called on a database that is already closed.

      • metrics

        public java.lang.String[] metrics()
        Return a list of metric names available for the database.
        Returns:
        metric names

      • metric

        public java.lang.Number metric(java.lang.String name)
        Return the value of a metric for the database
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the metric. Must be a valid metric name, and not null.
        Returns:
        the value. Zero is returned if there is no value for the metric.

      • metric

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Number> metric(java.lang.String[] names)
        Return the values for an array of metric names as a map from name to value.
        Parameters:
        names - The names of metrics to retrieve values for
        Returns:
        A map from metric name to metric value.

      • ents

        public Entity[] ents(java.lang.String kinds)
        Retrieve a list of all the entities in the database. If kinds is specified, returns only entities that match the kindstring. For more information on kindstrings, see the Perl API documentation.
        Parameters:
        kinds - An optional parameter. If null, all entities are returned.
        Returns:
        An array of Entities.

      • language

        public java.lang.String[] language()
        Return the language names of languages enabled in the database.
        Returns:
        language names.

      • metrics_treemap

        public byte[] metrics_treemap(java.lang.String sizemetric,
                     java.lang.String colormetric,
                     java.lang.String enttype)
        Generate a metric treemap with the given metrics and enttype.
        Parameters:
        sizemetric - The api name of the metric used for size. Must not be null.
        colormetric - The api name of the metric used for color. Must not be null.
        enttype - Either "file" "class" or "function", represents the type to map. If null, default is "file".
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the jpg of the map.

      • lookup_uniquename

        public Entity lookup_uniquename(java.lang.String uniquename)
        Retrieve an entity by it's unique name. Returns null if can't be resolved.
        Parameters:
        uniquename -
        Returns:
        An Entity, if found, null otherwise.
